tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HealthMetrics (
	metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	person_id UUID,
	record_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	heart_rate INTEGER,
	temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
	steps INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE health_metrics (
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    steps INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_info (
    user_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE health_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    step_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_type TEXT,
    data_value FLOAT
);
